title: Good speech for Gary
creator_credit: Bud Hollzer, Wilbur T. Blume, McGraw-Hill Films and University of Southern California
brief_description: Shows techniques of speech therapy used in a Californian class. Helps of all kinds are provided in the context of well-planned activities. Problems peculiar to individual children are dealt with by combined work of speech therapists, teachers, parents and health officials. Gives concrete suggestions (in the form of games and group activities) for correcting poor speech.
